remarks: Value of the uncurry functor, which is the reverse of the curry functor, taking ` G : C --> ( D --> E ) ` to ` uncurryF ( G ) : C X. D --> E ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2017.)
statement:
uncfval.g $e |- F = ( <" C D E "> uncurryF G ) $.
uncfval.c $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
uncfval.d $e |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) $.
uncfval.f $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func ( D FuncCat E ) ) ) $.
uncfval $p |- ( ph -> F = ( ( D evalF E ) o.func ( ( G o.func ( C 1stF D ) ) pairF ( C 2ndF D ) ) ) ) $.
